name: streaming-analyzer
description: Analyze and visualize HTTP ABR streams

scripts.build-css: cat css/*.css > dist/analyzer.css && cp fonts/*.woff dist/
scripts.build: npm run build-css && $(npm bin)/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] index.js -o dist/analyzer.js
